name: Ethereum Mining Commemorative Coin
metadata: {"name": "Ethereum Mining Commemorative Coin 1", "description": "Ethereum Mining Commemorative Coin (2022) is an issuance of a virtual commemorative coin that memorialises the mining that contributed to the network between 2015 and 2022 b�  to be halted forever, after the Merge. A Ghibli-style short animation by animator Simon Mine introduces the coin as it floats across a desert landscape, recalling the initial branding of the Frontier release in 2015. Through a globe network illustrated in the style of the Ethereum Homestead release graphics, a miner bought off ebay is retired foreverB b� and morphs into the commemorative coin.
